text: Hi Katie, I saw someone else approaching this by displaying the video player as an image of the thumbnail with a play button in the centre, rather than a real video player, and making the play button open the modal which contains the real video player. Maybe this might be what you're after?

Relating to <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CFPRTEGTX/p1707149792918919> - does anyone know if you can allow content editors to drag in any module they want into the section template? I would just keep the content separate but it needs to switch with the tabs so has to be accessible by the tabs module.
